title: How to use the app?
content: To use the app, simply download it from the store, register with your email, and start exploring features.

title: What services are available?
content: We offer a variety of services including gas price tracking, station locators, and route optimization.

title: How can I contact support?
content: You can contact support via the 'Help' section in the app or by sending an email to support@metan.by.

title: What payment methods are accepted?
content: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and mobile payment systems like Google Pay and Apple Pay.

title: Can I track my fuel consumption?
content: Yes, the app allows you to track your fuel consumption and generate detailed reports.
